item.title: Not quite the same: The social and phonetic conditioning of the FOOT-STRUT vowels in Manchester

item.title: Synchronic stratum-specific rates of application reflect diachronic change: morphosyntactic conditioning of variation in English /l/-darkening.
Some /l/s are darker than others: accounting for variation in English /l/ with ultrasound tongue imaging
